typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		type as string,
		id as string,
		timestamp as string,
		localTimestamp as string,
		serviceUrl as string,
		channelId as string,
		from as (id as string, name as string, aadObjectId as string, role as string),
		conversation as (conversationType as string, id as string, tenantId as string),
		recipient as (id as string, name as string),
		textFormat as string,
		locale as string,
		text as string,
		attachments as (contentType as string, content as string)[],
		entities as (type as string, locale as string, country as string, platform as string)[],
		channelData as (tenant as (id as string))
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true,
	unquotedColumnNames: true,
	hasComments: true) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		id = id,
		type,
		text
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
